title: aliitp2
author: aliitp2
content: I need to buy some btc for a family member in Canada using Canadian Bank debit card, I tried most known exchanges binance, crypto.com etc none of them worked as Canadian banks and card issuers block crypto exchanges, any successful experience and reputed exchanges to buy btc with low fees in Canada will be greatly appreciated, I only found those  other sure how legit they are: mybtc.caHelp appreciated thanks..

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: If they are blocked or restricted all you should do is to visit their local board here in the forum and run a p2p service then you could transfer fiat to those in Canada for you to receive bitcoin, that is the cheapest means and way to deal with the country restricted area.I could remembered when FG restricted our account and card from associating directly with cryptocurrency transaction we located ourselves here in fourm and started transacting before binance p2p came up and was dealing direct from them.At this stage I don't advice to use any vpn or ip otherwise your account could be frozen, instead p2p is the best options.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: You might as well use an exchange like Kraken and just do a bank transfer. You can use other exchanges like Gemini or Binance but you need to do a wire transfer for those which is more work.Yes you will need to KYC but you need to show ID at most Bitcoin ATMs anyways. At least that’s how it is in my province. Gone are the days when you could buy thousands at the ATM without KYC.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: adaseb on November 03, 2022, 03:51:54 AMYou might as well use an exchange like Kraken and just do a bank transfer. You can use other exchanges like Gemini or Binance but you need to do a wire transfer for those which is more work.The OP said he/she has tried almost known exchange binance, crypto.com but the Canadian bank and credit card company block every transaction that has to do with crypto exchange since this happened I don't think Kraken or Gemini exchange will work. What the OP need will be a Canadian local crypto exchange and if the bank/credit card company block the transaction then the best option is P2P on Binance or a reputable DEX that offer P2P crypto trading because the bank doesn't want to handle any transaction that has to do with crypto.
